tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following characteristics of plants is absent in charophyte algae?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Presence of chlorophyll b
X) Cellulose in the cell walls
Y) Sexual reproduction
Z) Alternation of multicellular generations
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Z) ALTERNATION OF MULTICELLULAR GENERATIONS
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following compounds would one use to detect the presence of protein in a polyacrylamide gel?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Ethidium bromide [eth-ih-dee-um broh-myde]
X) Coomassie Blue [coo-mah-see]
Y) Rhodamine 2 [row-duh-meen]
Z) Fluorescein [flow-ruh-seen]
